inn1.comm: he stays in the crease and defends a back of length delivery solidly towards point
on the middle stump line and the batsman stays in the crease to whip it off his pads, but he is not able to beat Parnell at square leg
angled across the left-hander, Jamshed leaves it alone
back of a length delivery on the middle stump line, easily clipped behind square on the leg side for a single
this one is angled from wide of crease and Shehzad stylishly gets up on one leg and flicks it off his hips to fine leg

he appeal for lbw as the batsman was stuck in the crease to this slightly fuller delivery, the slip cordon joins in a little later, but that looked like it pitched outside leg. No feet movement from Jamshed though..
starts off with a length delivery on the middle stump line, it curves back a touch too, the batsman pushes it to cover
length delivery on off this time, Shahzad stays in the crease and defends it solidly towards the leg side
length delivery with a little more width this time, Shehzad stays on the back foot and defends it towards cover
another shout for lbw as Shehzad tries to flick a fullish delivery to the leg side, but he plays across the line, it's on the margins of the leg stump and that is what saves the batsman
he is reluctant to come forward and chases an angled delivery, gets a thick outside edge to third man
length delivery, 129kph, just outside off, the batsman defends it to the off side
short delivery this time on off, the batsman was ready for the pull and he rolls his wrists on it nicely too, but straight to square leg
he pushes the length further up, and this is outside off and straightens too, the batsman leaves it alone
he keeps it in the channel outside off and gets the steep bounce he gets everywhere in the world, the batsman lets it go through
another short delivery on the body and like in the first over, Shahzad gets up on his one leg and pulls it down to fine leg

oh super catch this one at fine leg by Lopsy! Jamshed falls early again. It was a similar delivery that Shahzad pulled down to fine leg comfortably, but Jamshed doesn't get properly behind the line while playing the pull, gets a thick leading edge as the ball gets big on him, and it flies high fine on the leg side. AB makes a dash for it, but Lopsy runs in and dives to pick it inches off the turf
back of length rising delivery on off, the batsman defends it down the pitch
he sticks to length around off stump and the batsman defends it without much feet movement
Professor takes his first run with a push towards cover point
he tests Shehzad with fuller length this time, but it's wider outside off and the batsman leaves it alone
this one is still wider outside off and takes off after hitting the deck, left alone by the batsman
he keeps angling it across the right hander, 133 kph, the batsman covers his stumps and lets it go through
back of length this time and on the stumps, the batsman stays in the crease and defends solidly
length delivery on off, keeps coming in with the angle, the batsman comes half forward and defends it to the leg side
more good work with Lopsy! He runs to his left at third man as the outside edge was running quickly in that direction, sticks his hand out and keeps the ball in
length delivery outside off, the batsman leaves it alone
more work for Lopsy at third man, but this one is easier as the batsman has steered the short of length delivery
back of length on off, the batsman stays in the crease and defends it to cover
play and a miss as Shehzad chases this wider delivery without getting anywhere close to it
now Lopsy beats professor with an angled delivery, the batsman plays inside the line of it
back of length across the right hander, this time Hafeez lets it go through
and another good delivery, he keeps it consistently around off and keeps taking it away from the right hander, Professor leaves it alone
more accurate stuff from the bowler, it's just outside off and the batsman leaves it on the angle
back of length this time on off stump, the batsman gets up on his toes and punches it straight to cover
he stays in the crease and defends the length delivery towards cover point
he bowls it full and gets some swing in to the batsman straightaway, and the batsman loves it too, he drives it beautifully through midwicket for the first boundary of the innings
it's not so short, but the batsman plays the pull anyway, off the front foot, but he is not fully in control of that, it slips down to deep backward square leg
length delivery on off, similar to what Lopsy has been bowling, left alone by the batsman
this time Professor is quick to stamp his authority. Again, not so short, but the batsman was ready for the pull, pushes it past midwicket for a couple
the bats have started to come down harder on the ball now, Shahzad cuts it hard but is not able to beat point
he bowls fuller this time, the batsman doesn't come fully forward, pushes it to mid-off
this one is one proper pull shot! Hard and handsome! It was short by Lopsy and Shehzad slaps it through midwicket with some force
he goes back to bowling length and the batsman dabs it towards cover, the non-striker sets off, but is sent back in time
nicely steered down to third man with a wristy roll of the bat, gets him a single
oh beautiful! Professor doesn't come full forward but this was in his slot to drive on the up and that's what he does, creaming it through cover point
back of length delivery on off, the batsman defends off the back foot
he bowls a slower one that the batsman dabs it towards cover for a quick single, but the non-striker is slow and had that hit, he was gone
and another powerful pull! Professor is not going to hold back as he smashes this short delivery through square leg
length delivery on the stumps, this time he goes back and punches it to midwicket
fuller delivery and that is not a problem for Professor, he whips it between square leg and midwicket for a couple more
he gets one to come in to the batsman and hits the pads, but that was short in length and was always going over
fuller length delivery targeting stumps, the batsman defends it towards midwicket
full on the pads and Professor punishes it by timing it crisply through midwicket, the fielder chases it all the way, but loses the race
back of length outside off, Shahzad stays in the crease and punches it firmly to off, straight to cover though
length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and drives it down to mid-off
another nicely timed back foot punch fails to beat the in-field, he hits the slower delivery straight to cover
this time it's better from Shehzad, he takes a forward step and plays a beautiful square drive, which is only slowed by the fielder getting a hand to that at point
this one is on off and Shehzad whips it past wide mid-on with a bottom-handed shot
he stays low and carves a length delivery for a single to third man
he pushes this one through outside off and there is not much room, but Shehzad goes on the back foot and cuts it firmly to beat point, beautiful shot
here comes the customary full toss from Tahir and the batsman just pushes it to wide long on for a single
flighted and full outside off, the batsman leans forward and pushes it to cover
flatter this time and on off stump, the batsman waits and steers it to backward point
another full and flighted delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to cover and thinks of a single, but the fielder cuts it off
quicker delivery on the middle stump, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
length delivery on off, the batsman defends it off the back foot
length delivery on off, the batsman chops it to backward point for a single
he strays on the pads and Hafeez just clips it off his hips, he has timed it well and he has picked the gap at deep backward square leg to perfection too
fuller this time, Hafeez comes forward and drives to deep cover
now he flicks to pick up a single to deep square leg

he is gone! Professor, what have you done! The lecture is prematurely over! He was playing so well but this time, he tries to unsettle the bowler by moving about in the crease, but that only upsets his concentration as he chops the back of the length delivery on to his stumps
tossed up delivery wide of off, easily driven to deep cover for a single
more flight and on off stump, Misbah drives it to cover
short ball by Tahir, he keeps bowling one or two of these, but Misbah pulls it straight to midwicket
this one is tossed up on off, the batsman drives it back to the bowler
good delivery on off this time, draws the batsman forward, who defends it to cover point
full and flighted, Misbah drives it to deep extra cover with ease for a single
length delivery on the stumps, Misbah turns it to square leg off the back foot
he tests Misbah with a wide length delivery, but these ones are not for him, he watches it go through to the keeper
bowls a full slower delivery wide outside off, the batsman stretches forward and pushes it to mid-off for a single
tests the batsman with a bouncer and it's a good one, Shehzad ducks out of the way
this one cuts in after pitching and Shehzad gets an inside edge to deep backward square leg
length delivery on off, Misbah comes forward and guides it to third man for a single
flatter and spinning away around off, the batsman stays back and dabs it to point
fuller and on the pads, the batsman nudges it to midwicket for a single
teases the batsman with a floater outside off, the batsman lets it go through

fuller and flighted, the batsman drives it towards long off, but Faf comes in flying to intercept it from cover, creates confusion and Misbah would have been out had he hit, he was miles down the crease
tries to cut a not so short one and is beaten outside off
another quicker delivery on off, this time it takes the edge and runs fine on the off side
length delivery around off, the batsman comes forward and defends
back of length delivery on the stumps, Misbah tucks it behind square on the leg side for a single
another accurate delivery on off, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
he pushes this one wide outside off, he is probably upset by Zee's comment, it's past the wide marker
this one is short and wide outside off, the batsman cuts it behind point, but Morkel runs it from third man and slides to keep it in
full delivery aimed on off stump, the batsman punches it to mid-on for a single
short delivery on off, the batsman ducks under it comfortably
he beats the bat straightaway, fuller and it straightens outside off, the batsman has a poke at that
length delivery angled on to the stumps, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
short delivery on the body, Shehzad has been playing them better than Jamshed, he pulls it down to fine leg with ease
short ball to Misbah as well, but he won't play a pull this early in his innings, he ducks under it and smiles at the bowler
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman keeps his hands away from it
a quick short delivery to end the over, Misbah response is expected, he ducks under it
full delivery on the off stump, the batsman drives it straight back at the bowler
he comes forward and slices the full delivery down to third man
length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and defends it to cover
attempts a slower delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to deep cover for a single
shuffles across the crease and punches a full delivery to mid-on for a quick single
fuller length delivery, Misbah dabs it towards backward point and thinks of a single, but the fielder there dives and prevents it from going beyond him

he walks across the stumps and gets hit on the knee-roll as he went across the line, the bowler started appealing first, then the others joined in, the hawkeye says it would have just hit the top of leg stump.. Umpire's call that is
he stays in the crease and punches the length delivery from off towards mid-on, but the fielder dives to stop that
here comes the short ball, it's quite high and so Shehzad ducks under it
another short delivery, it's at 141.2 kph, the batsman ducks under it and then looks towards the umpire, who shakes his head
and another short ball, but this one is around shoulder high, Shehzad was ready for it and slaps it to deep midwicket
length delivery on the pads by Parnell, it's clipped away to deep backward square leg, Shehzad slips at non-striker's end and collides with the bowler.. Magnetic he is, Shehzad that is
short of length delivery, but this is down the leg side
pitches it full and the batsman punches it back to the bowler firmly
he shuffles across and slaps a short of length delivery to deep square leg for a couple
and he gets a short ball which he has been playing well all day, swings his bat and sends it to the boundary fine on the leg side
length delivery on off, this time he stays in the crease and defends to cover
and another short ball, and again Shehzad pulls it handsomely, but this time he finds the man at deep square leg with it
bowls full and quick on off, the batsman pushes it to cover
tossed up delivery on the middle, the batsman defends it to midwicket
tossed up again, wide outside off, the batsman eases it to long off for a single
he comes forward and pushes a full delivery back to the bowler
another full delivery on off, the batsman drives it to long off for a single
slower and flighted outside off, the batsman dabs it towards point and calls for a single
pitches it up and on the pads, the batsman punches it to midwicket
back of length delivery on the middle stump, the batsman clips it to fine leg for a single
fuller length outside off, Misbah comes forward and pushes it to cover
he walks across the stumps and tucks a length delivery to square leg
he tries to whip it fine on the leg side, but gets hit on the thigh pad
short delivery to end the over, Misbah ducks under it as expected
he dabs it to point for a quick single, there is a chance of overthrow, but Misbah turns it down
ehi! It's tossed up to Misbah and he surprises everyone by getting down on his knee and launching this way way deep over long on.. way deep in the stands
bowls a shorter, quicker delivery on off and Misbah punches it to long on to get away from the strike
and Shehzad completes his third consecutive ODI fifty with an easy push towards midwicket
tossed up delivery on off, Misbh pushes it to wide mid-on for a single
tossed up and full outside off, the batsman just chips it over extra cover, he didn't try to hit that hard at all, but it's nicely in the gap
he starts off with a length delivery on off, the batsman dabs it towards point
he hops on his toes and steers the back of length delivery down to third man
he tries to bowl a slower bouncer but Shehzad was waiting for that, he controls the pull to deep square leg
short ball to Misbah too, who pulls it this time, down to fine leg for a single
length delivery wide outside off, the batsman lets it go through
back of length delivery on off, the batsman defends it to point
full and flighted on middle, the batsman drives it down to long off for a single
waits for it turn away and then cuts it hard, but hits it straight to point
full and flighted outside off, the batsman drags it to square leg with a sweep shot
another legspinning delivery outside off, the batsman again chops it to point
gives it some air on off, the batsman closes the face and punches it to long on against the turn
pushes it through this time, the batsman comes forward and defends
short delivery, slightly slower in pace, the batsman has to drag it to deep midwicket
oh this was a good delivery and Misbah is lucky to survive as this just rises on AB, he jumps and sticks his right hand out, but just gets a glove on it. It got big on Misbah and took a healthy edge
back of length this time, the batsman defends it to cover
back of length and outside off, the batsman gets up on his toes and steers it past point, it wasn't very far from that fielder at point, Faf it was
slower delivery on the stumps, the batsman nudges it to square leg for a single
good rising delivery on the body, the batsman has to stand tall and defend it down from right in front of his face, that was well played
he pushes this one to deep midwicket for a single
he comes forward and smothers the spin as he defends
on the pads, the batsman flicks it to deep square leg with a whip of his wrist
good little period for Tahir, the batsman comes forward to defends a length delivery on off
little width this time and the batsman cuts, but finds the fielder at point
tossed up and slower , the batsman comes forward and pushes it back to Tahir
length delivery on off, the batsman defends it towards cover

oh Misbah! what was that? Neither here nor there. After playing within himself for so long, he tries to flick a short of length delivery from off to over deep midwicket boundary, he wasn't aiming for a four, he was aiming for a six there. The ball was not full enough and he is not able to control that shot, it just goes as far as deep midwicket, who takes the catch comfortably some 10 meters inside he boundary
length delivery wide outside off, the batsman stays back and cuts it to third man
he bowls it short and wide, but the batsman lets it go through
he pitches it fuller and Amin doesn't come too far forward, gets a thick outside edge to third man
length delivery wide outside off, the batsman crunches it off the back foot but can't beat the man at point
length delivery of the stumps, the batsman punches it to wide mid-on
he starts off with a googly to the left-hander, who pushes it to cover
and this one is a googly too, but it's filthy as this is way outside off, but hang on, AB has flicked off the bails and they are checking for a stumping. But the batsman is fine here
tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman drives it to deep cover for a single

and another one! What's happening here? We surely don't want to see a repeat of what happened two days back! He tosses it up on off stump and Shehzad goes for a drive, but ends up lobbing it back to the bowler. Tahir gobbles it up and Shehzad is gone for the same score he got in Sharjah
tossed up delivery outside off, Akmal comes forward and defends
bowls a quicker and flatter on the middle stump, Akmal punches it down to long on for a single
and Tahir, as is his wont, bowls a long hop that Amin slaps past midwicket to wide long-on
bowls a full delivery on the pads which Akmal flicks straight to square leg
back of length delivery on the middle stump line, the batsman goes on the back foot and defends to midwicket
he waits on the back foot and defends the back of length delivery towards point
this is one is on the pads and Akmal easily flicks it fine for a couple down to fine leg
he goes back and steers the length delivery down to third man for a single
he bowls a wide line to Amin, the batsman watches it go through to the keeper
oh and again, it's driven in the air towards Tahir and it just drops short! It was a flighted delivery like the one that got Shehzad
quicker delivery and shorter too, punches to deep midwicket for a single
slightly short on off, the batsman waits on the back foot and turns it away to deep midwicket with the turn
quicker delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and defends
oh that was a good loopy delivery, the batsman went for a drive, but he didn't realise that was the googly, misses the edge of the bat
slightly shorter this time, the batsman chops it to backward point
he bowls a length delivery wide outside off, Amin chases that one for a drive, but that just eludes the outside edge
he bowls a yorker on off this time, the batsman digs it out towards mid-on
length delivery on off, Amin stands tall and punches it through cover for a single to the fielder in deep
back of length delivery on the pads, the batsman hops and clips it to deep square leg
short ball this time for Amin, but Parnell loses direction and it's down the leg side
oh that was not very far from the lone slip fielder, Smith there! It was a probing delivery outside off, the batsman tries to push at it away from the body and the ball takes a thick outside edge
now he comes forward and punches the length delivery down the ground through mid-on - there is no one there - for a couple
full and on the middle stump line, the batsman defends it down the pitch
bowls a filthy long hop which luckily for him doesn't bounce much, the batsman gets an under edge to short fine as he looks to pull it
quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
full and flighted this time, the batsman drives it to cover
another quicker one on off, the batsman doesn't have room, he defends to cover
another quicker delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to cover
that's what Akmal can do! He gets a length delivery on off and just slap it over the umpire's head with a clean swing
the bowler shortens the length this time and Akmal tucks it to backward point for a single
back of length delivery on off, the batsman stays in the crease and punches it to cover
nicely driven to wide mid-off, but the fielder cuts it off
length delivery wide outside off, the batsman stays in the crease and cuts it past point for a single to deep backward point
and another powerful cut, but this time he hits it straight to point
he cuts to turn one in to the batsman, the batsman gets hit high on the pads
fuller and flighted on the middle, the batsman defends it to midwicket
fuller and almost yorker length, the batsman digs it out to the bowler
pushes it through on off and Akmal can't get it away, defended to midwicket
tossed up on the pads, the batsman works it away to square leg for a single
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman drives it to the right of the bowler, who dives and makes a good stop
short delivery on off, the batsman dabs it towards midwicket, but the non-striker runs halfway down before he is sent back, he survives as he makes back in time
he bowls a slower bouncer, really really slow bouncer, the batsman waits and waits, but can't put bat on it
takes the pace of it again, the batsman defends the length delivery to the off side
short ball this time, Akmal guides it to fine leg with a pull
angled in on the stumps, the batsman defends as there is no room available
a touch fuller this time and the batsman comes forward to drive, but he can only find the man at cover
starts off with a short of length delivery, the batsman defends it towards point as there is no room
now he tries to make room to go over the infield, but Morkel, clevely drops the pace, and the batsman misses his attempted swing of the bat
he follows it up with a yorker on off stump, Akmal digs it out towards point
that almost took the head off Morkel! Monster hit that one! Like two balls ago, Akmal moves to the leg side and tennis-bats the length delivery straight at Morkel who is lucky to get under it
now he targets his partner at the other end with a similar shot, but the mid-on fielder cuts it off

he timed that one to perfection but straight into the hands of the cover fielder! Akmal moved towards the leg side and Morkel responded with a quick full delivery on off stump, the batsman got down on his knee and crashes it towards cover, his only mistake is that he is hit that in the air. Ingram moves to his left and takes a smart catch
length delivery outside off, slower as well, the batsman lets it go
another tight delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it back down the pitch

and another one! The wheels are coming off! Powerplay takes another one! This was a slower bouncer, down the leg side, Amin went for the pull but the movement of the bat and the arrival of the ball was not in sync, and he ends up gloving it to the keeper ..
he bowls a full toss on the off stump, but Tanvir pushes it to midwicket
now Tanvir gets a short delivery, he ducks down just in time
and another short one this time, Tanvir fends it off to fine leg for a single to keep Afridi away from strike
pushes the batsman back with a quick short of length delivery, the batsman defends it to cover
he runs in and bowls a short of length delivery angling in at the left-hander, Tanvir hops and defends
and he stays back to this one which is fuller, it just flies past the outside edge
another short ball, slower at 138.7, Tanvir gets up on his toes and defends
he has had enough of defending, so he tries to short-arm-jab this shorter delivery to the leg side, but Morkel is too quick for him and the ball splits him in half
he gets some bat on it finally and manages to just clear the fielder at mid-on, that was a flat hit and it runs away to the boundary quickly
it's a short one and he doesn't take the bait, ducks under it
aims for a yorker, but this is a full toss on off, Afridi wanted to drive it through cover, but the bat turns in his hands and he ends up playing it back at the bowler
another yorker attempt, another full toss and this time Afridi crunches a straight drive, beautifully hit, but it hits the stumps at the other end
he gets a slower bouncer this time and he waits ..and waits.. before pulling it down to fine leg
a short delivery for Tanvir, but this is at normal speed and goes past his helmet
he stays back in the crease and steers the length delivery to third man for a single
he sends a loopy one down for Tanvir, who defends it back down the pitch
quicker and flatter, Tanvir tries to work it to the leg side but gets a leading edge back to the bowler
now he tries to push it to off, but gets and inside edge towards the bowler
quicker one this time, the batsman defends it down the pitch
tossed up on off, the batsman nudges it to midwicket to bring Afridi on strike..
he does what he does, gets a shortish delivery that he whacks to wide long-on for a couple
full delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to cover
he bowls it full on off, Tanvir drives it to long on for a single
Afridi gets a short ball and Afridi hits the short ball in the air, he gets four for it, and it was well over square leg. There is a fielder at deep midwicket though.. Got to be careful.
he makes room by moving towards the leg side and gets a juicy high full toss that he just slices over the point fielder with ease
now he moves to the off side to work it away on the leg, but gets a leading edge towards mid-off, luckily for him the field is back
length delivery on off, Tanvir drives it firmly to mid-off
back of length delivery on off, the batsman stays back and steers it to third man for a single
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman drives it straight to midwicket
now he comes forward to drive it to cover
shorter delivery this time, but pushes to midwicket

midwicket, cover, midwicket, cover - he does the sequence right, but he had beaten the cover fielder this time. Afridi thinks he hasn't, so he stays in the crease. Meanwhile, Tanvir has run all the way down to the non-striker's and then he has to run all the way back. The long on fielder had it easy, he just had to fire a throw at AB. Always funny to watch a horrible mix-up, not so funny for Tanvir though
tossed up delivery and it's a googly, the batsman comes forward and gets an inside edge to the leg side
he again presses forward and defends the full delivery to cover. What more, it's a maiden
length delivery on off and Afridi swings his bat to club it through the gap at wide mid-on, he didn't get hold of it fully, but enough for him to earn a couple
he makes room by moving outside leg, but the bowler chases him with a quick short one. The batsman chops it to behind square on the leg side
some hesitation again as Wahab looks for a quick single to cover, but he is sent back in time
and more hesitation! The batsman dabbed it towards point and took off immediately, but Faf at point got to the ball quickly and sent the throw back in no time..
on the pads and Wahab this time gets hit on the thigh pad, but that helps him get away from the strike
he moves well outside off to flick the full delivery fine on the leg side, but it's too quick for him, it hits the outside of the bat and rolls down towards third man
it was a short ball alright, but it was very quick too, it hits Afridi's pads as he was shaping for the pull
slower this time and outside off, the batsman chops it on towards point
flighted delivery on the pads, Afridi takes it on the full and flicks it to deep square leg
full and on the leg stump line, Wahab gets his first run with a push to midwicket
tosses it up wide outside off and it turns further away, Afridi leaves it thinking it's a wide, but the umpire disagrees
full delivery on off and Afridi powers a drive through cover, in the air, it's not too far from the fielder at cover, but comfortable runs for Afridi
he bowls a full inswinging delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to point, this time Afridi wants a run and Wahab sends him back
horrible delivery as he looks for a short one, but it's way down the leg side
bowls a quick full toss on the off stump, Wahab can only push it as far as cover
short delivery this time, Wahab throws his bat at it, but misses it completely
a slower bouncer now, just on off stump, the batsman watches it go through to the keeper
now he fires one in the block hole, Wahab drives it firmly to long on for a single
he gets the length and he gives it the distance! Afridi swings and although it looks like it's going to Burj Khalifa in the night sky, it drops over the boundary at long-off, only just.
he moves way outside leg, throws his bat at that too soon, but it's a slower ball, and wahab is nowhere near it
he fires it full and he fires it down the leg side
he has been hogging the strike, but he hits it bigger that Afridi! It was length and he punches it like a boxer, into the second tier over cow corner. Afridi would be proud of that shot
makes room and gets a yorker, but he manages to push it to long on for a single
he bowls it full and wide outside off, the batsman was already making room and he misses the ball as he tries to drive it through off
short ball, Afridi pulls out the pull, he doesn't hit it as well as Wahab, but Pakistan will take that. It's flat and it goes to the deep midwicket boundary after one bounce
he bowls it full and wide outside off, Afridi misses it, AB appeals for caught behind, but it is called a wide

and Smith throws water on Afridi's little bonfire as the batsman slaps a full-toss straight in to the hands of mid-off. The umpire's check for the no-ball - both for front foot and for height - but Afridi has to go
another wide as the slower bouncer sails over the batsman's head
he fires it full and quick on the pads, the batsman drives it to wide long on to bring up the 200

and the penultimate wicket falls! Saeed Ajmal is gone off the first ball, but he has got to review, so he uses it anyway. It was a slower offcutter and Ajmal was playing across the line, he was hit right in front of the middle to the naked eye and the ball-tracker confirms that
bowls a length delivery wide outside off, the ball flies past the wide marker and the umpire takes a good look at it before saying it's fine
bowls it full and he appeals for an lbw, but that had a big inside edge on to it
back of length delivery hit Irfan's solid defence like it just hit a mountain
slower delivery on off, again Irfan dead bats it towards point
he bowls it full and he bowls it wide outside off, the batsman makes no connection
he gets six more, it was a length ball and Wahab was deep in the crease, but he hits it straight down the ground with all his might and clears the rope at long-on
that was crisply hit off his pads, but he finds the man at square leg. Had he beaten the man, that was a four
he goes back to the wide line outside off and the batsman misses it as he has moved too far down the leg side
and another full delivery wide outside off and again he beats the bat
and another one of those! Full and quick wide outside off, Wahab cannot connect with it at all
he bowls a full delivery on the pads, the batsman gets hit on the pads and he takes off for a single to midwicket, but the throw hits him flush on the back
full delivery on off, Wahab gets a good amount of bat on it as he drives it straight past the umpire, but Faf at long-off dives and prevents the boundary
he bowls a good yorker on the middle, the batsman pushes it to long-off but declines the single
he gets just the right length to get under it, but doesn't get hold of the shot, holes out at long-off

inn2.comm: nearly in the block hole on the off stump, Smith blocks it
on length outside off, Smith pushes it to cover
back of length outside off, Smith shuffles across a bit and turns it past midwicket to get off the mark
back of length just outside off, Ingram thought of playing but left it. Tense moments for the batsman here
on the pads, Ingram flicks straight to Afridi at midwicket and says no for the single, but Smith came out a little bit and overthrows get Ingram off the mark
absolutely full and nearly in the block hole on leg stump, Ingram defends and thick outside edge goes rolling on the off side
fullish outside off, turned on the leg side for a single between midwicket and mid-on
some noise as that went past the batsman and the keeper appeals for caught behind but umpire calls it a wide as it went down leg

straight through Ingram this time! This was right on target, inswinging length delivery from outside off, Ingram defended apprehensively and went through the gate to crash into the stumps. No convincing scoring shots from Ingram again
angled into the pads from length, tucked to square leg
aimed towards the off stump from outside off, Duminy defends on the off side
short of length around middle and swings enough to go down leg for a wide
length delivery outside off, Duminy leans forward to defend off the middle of the bat
fuller and wider outside off, Duminy chases without footwork and gets a bottom edge on the off side
short ball just outside off, Smith turns it to midwicket off his toes
full outside off, Smith drives that one through the covers but it won't go all the way
back of length close to off, Smith tucks it to deep fine leg
length delivery angled into the stumps, Duminy defends carefully
length ball outside off, enough room for Duminy to drive it on the up just past mid-off for two
short and wide, this one goes all the way despite the slow outfield. It gave enough room to Duminy to cut it through square on the off side. First convincing four of the innings
on length a fair bit outside off, Smith prods it to cover
on length outside off, Smith shuffles across to tuck it past midwicket for one
too full and Duminy crashes this through the covers. He's in form and you can't pitch it up there to him. Excellent looking cover drive from Duminy, well in the gap
length ball outside off, Duminy leaves it
slightly short outside off, Duminy stays back and punches it to cover
length ball outside off, Duminy puts his front foot forward and lets it go
on length outside off, Smith sends it to the leg side off the back foot
short of length offspinner outside off, driven to short cover
slightly shorter and Duminy goes to the back foot to crash it square on the off side right in the gap for another four
straighter and fuller outside off, Duminy cut again off the back foot but gets an inside edge
on length on the stumps, Duminy defends on the leg side
straight delivery on length, Duminy leans forward and defends
slightly full outside off, flicked past midwicket for a single
length delivery outside off, Duminy watches and leaves it
similar delivery outside off, Duminy put his front foot towards the ball and left it again
touch fuller outside off, Duminy drives and it falls a couple of yards short of point
coming into the batsman from outside off, Duminy defends it back
length delivery outside off, coming in and Duminy defends confidently on the off side
straight ball on middle, Smith comes down and turns it behind square on the leg side
big appeal for caught behind! It was an offspinner very close to off, Duminy put his bat forward but it just missed the bat and the off stump
length ball outside off, Duminy goes to back foot and cuts it on off
on length on the stumps, pushed down to mid-on
fuller on the stumps, Duminy defends it back
full on off, Duminy leans forward to defend and inside edge hits his pad
back of length around off, Smith stays back and pushes this one to short midwicket
on length outside off, Smith moves towards the ball and drives it down to mid-off
swing and a miss! It was on length outside off, Smith chased it to drive it through the covers but missed it as it went past the outside edge
on length outside off, Smith pushes it to mid-on this time
full on the pads, runs it down to deep fine leg for one
fullish and well outside off, Duminy drives it past cover point to keep the strike
flighted and full close to off, driven down to long-off
on length and quicker outside off, smith defends and it somehow misses the outside edge

big appeal for lbw as this one pitched around middle and leg and was straighter, umpire turns the appeal down but Hafeez and Misbah review it. Smith stayed back and wanted to turn it on leg. Replays show it was umpire's call. Hard luck for Pakistan to lose a review as it was very very close
fuller outside off, pushed to point off the front foot
fuller on the stumps, Smith comes down to flick it on leg and Afridi dives to his left at midwicket to save a single
just past Misbah at cover as it went in the air! The offspinner was full outside off and Smith drive, leading edge wasn't too far from Misbah
back of length outside off, tucked on the leg side, a dive at short midwicket saves some runs
full and wide, Smith drives and finds the gap between point and cover as it's headed for the boundary as Shahzad dives just in time to save a run near the boundary
length delivery on off, Duminy defends it back
outside off, driven straight to short cover
slower ball at 107kph outside off, Duminy spots it and drives past mid-off for a single
bowled cross seam, back of length from outside off, Smith shuffles to turn it on leg but it hits his pads
full and coming in from off, Duminy blocks
back of length outside off, cut to point off the back foot
shorter and straighter, Duminy comes down and misses as it hits his pads
on length on the stumps, Duminy blocks it
this one came in after pitching outside off, Duminy played for the off spin off the back foot and inside edge goes on the leg side
full outside off, Duminy drives it back firmly and Hafeez dives full length to his right to keep it a maiden as the crowd roars for the effort
length ball outside off, Smith pushes it carefully towards point
full and well outside off, smith shuffled across all the way to sweep it but missed it completely
fuller on the stumps, pushed to short midwicket
full and just outside off, Smith leans forward to block it
flighted well outside off, Smith comes down and defends it again
slightly quicker on off as Smith flicked it to midwicket, second maiden in a row from Pakistan
flighted offspinner outside off, Duminy drives and outside edge goes towards the third man area
full on the stumps, Duminy sweeps it fine for a couple
on the stumps again, Duminy guides it to fine leg
flatter one on the stumps, Smith comes down and tucks it to midwicket
slower and coming in, Smith stayed back this time and wanted to work it on leg, but gets an inside edge onto the pads
slightly fuller outside off, driven to mid-off
length ball outside off, Duminy leaves it
straighter length ball outside off, pushed to cover
full on middle, swept to deep fine leg

Smith's bowled! He was shuffling across the stumps again and again and this time it cost him. The ball was outside off and he exposed all his stumps to sweep it, didn't connect and the ball hit the pads to disturb the stumps around his legs
on length from outside off, cut to sweeper cover off the back foot
full on off, driven to deep midwicket for a single
slightly full on off, driven on the on side for a single
full on the pads, on-driven past midwicket for two

Duminy goes now - caught at slip, the crowd roars! It was outside off on length, Duminy drove and the outside edge went past the keeper as Hafeez took a very sharp and good catch at first slip. Irfan gets really high-fives from team-mates
back of length and angling away outside off, Faf defends it towards cover
drops short of first slip! On length outside off, Faf defends it and it keeps low as the outside edge goes to first slip after a bounce
on length on the off stump, pushed down to mid-off
short and flat on middle, AB stays back to turn it to deep midwicket
on length and turning into the stumps, Faf attempts a sweep and misses, hits the pad outside off
on length and hits the pad again, this time going down leg
edged to slip! This one kept straight, Faf defended and hit Hafeez on his left leg, falling just short as he went for the catch to his right
short of length outside off, comes down and defends
full on off, defends it back to Ajmal
full on the stumps, driven to dep midwicket for a single
back of length on leg, Faf gets off the mark by running it fine on the leg side
full on off, driven handsomely by Faf down the ground. Timed so well that it goes for four even after hitting Irfan's leg on the way
on length outside off, Faf leans forward to defend
touch fuller outside off, inviting to drive, left by the batsman
on length and wider outside off, left alone again
big appeal as the batsman reverse swept, it hit him on the front pad and the ball lobbed to first slip who takes the catch. Umpire turned down appeals for lbw and catch both
flighted and on off, turned to midwicket
full on off, AB block it
full on leg, turns down leg for a wide
shorter and turning to leg stump, turned to square leg off the back foot
fuller on the stumps, defends it back to Ajmal
almost caught and bowled! It was slower, AB was in the shot early as it was on length on the stumps, the straight bat sent the ball ballooning back to Ajmal but fell well short
short of length outside off, cut to sweeper cover
full and outside off, AB drives and misses as the Pakistan players appeal. They probably heard something but umpires says no
on drivable length outside off again, left for the keeper
back of length outside off, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot
on length outside off, leaves it for the keeper
back of length outside off, another single to sweeper cover
on length on the stumps, defends it on the leg side
flighted outside off, Faf comes down to drive it on leg
full on off, the batsman blocks it
flighted and fuller on middle, Faf turns it on the leg side
full on off, comes down to drive it to midwicket
shorter outside off, turns it as AB tucks it on the leg side where a dive at midwicket saves a run
back of length on leg, played off the hips for a single
bouncer on middle, AB stays back and pulls, keeps it down as it goes to deep midwicket
length delivery outside off and angling away, left alone
short ball on middle, pulled to mid-on after a bounce, didn't connect that well
on length from outside off and angling in, thick edge goes to point
full and outside off, Faf comes across a bit and flicks it to leg for a single
flighted on middle and leg, bat and pad and ball doesn't go anywhere
shorter and quicker, Faf comes down to defend
straighter one around off, Faf goes back to defend it on leg
back of length and turning in form outside off, defends it back to Ajmal
full on middle, flicked to midwicket and sharp fielding from Shahzad diving to his right keeps it to a dot ball
full and outside off, a poke from Faf on the off side gives him a single

the man strikes first ball! It was quick, it was short and too quick for Faf to get bat on it. It pitched on off as the batsman stayed on the back foot to play across the line but missed the flipper completely and it would have hit off stump. The umpires tell the batsmen, who are discussing whether to review it or not, that they have taken too much time to decide, du Plessis walks back
turning in from length, Miller defends
fuller outside off, flicked in the air but it goes past midwicket as the crowd says 'oooh'
back of length from outside off, driven down past a diving midwicket for a single
quick and back of length on off, AB stays back to cut it to deep point
full and outside off, flicked in the air again on the leg side for a single
on middle, AB comes down to drive it to long-on
full on off, defends it back to the bowler
quicker one around leg as it hits Miller on the pads, going down leg
full on middle, another leading edge goes towards midwicket, falls short
full on off, driven to long-off for a single
slightly slower and turning in from outside off, defended back to the bowler
short of length outside off, pushed down to long-on

the finger has gone up and very very slowly! It was a quick legspinner outside off, AB wanted to cut it but got an edge to the keeper who ran towards Afridi as he turned back to see the umpire's decision. The umpire did not move initially but the finger did go up along with the decibel level of the crowd. South Africa's top half is back in the pavilion
fuller on the stumps, defends it on the leg side
back of length delivery, pushed to midwicket
full on off, turned to the leg side for a single
short of length outside off, turned square of the wicket on leg
full outside off, defends it on the off side
on length going towards the stumps, this one kept low as Miller defended it
on length, pushed to cover on off
on length outside off, pushed towards cover for a single
full on off, driven down to long-off
back of length on middle, turned to long-on for another single
full outside off, turned to the leg side for one
back of length turning down leg, pushed to square leg
flighted on the pads, pushed to square leg again where the fielder dives to save a single
quicker one on pads, to square leg again
fuller on the stumps, finds the gap between midwicket and square leg
full around off, Miller flicks it between midwicket and square leg
full on the stumps, driven to long-on for a single
from round the wicket, full on middle an leg, defends it back to the bowler
full and outside off, driven down to long-off

Hafeez strikes again as the quicker ball gets hims another. Miller has reviewed it though. It pitched on middle, was sliding towards leg and hit him on the back pad as he was beaten by pace and the finger went up. Hawkeye says it's clipping leg so it's the umpires call, but in Pakistan's favour this time
on length outside off, pushed towards cover
flighted outside off, thick edge goes behind square on the off side as Parnell drives
full and flighted on off, pushed on the off side for one
that went through everything! Pitched on middle, went through the defence, missed the stumps and even the keeper couldn't catch it cleanly
full around off, driven down to long-off
round the wicket, back of length legspinner outside off, McLaren cuts it late for a single
outside off on length and Parnell reverse sweeps this well in the gap past short third man for four
full on the stumps, driven past the bowler down the ground
on length outside off, cut to deep backward point off the back foot
back of length and quick outside off, it kept low as the batsman defended it
on the stumps, pushed straight to cover
slightly shorter on middle, driven to cover
sways down the leg side and he runs it to deep fine leg for one
on length on the stumps, Parnell pushes it down to long-off
full on off, driven down to long-off
flighted and full on the stumps, turned to midwicket
flighted and full down the leg side, turned straight to square leg
offspinner on off, McLaren drives and get a thick outside edge fine past the keeper for four
full outside off, driven down firmly and mid-off dives to save two runs
full and outside off, driven firmly to mid-off
length ball on off, Parnell pushes it back to Riaz
short ball outside off, Parnell cuts it late to third man
back of length on middle and leg, tucked to square leg
bouncer just outside off, Parnell drops his hands to defend it with soft hands for a quick single
back of length close to off, McLaren is sent back for the single after he defended it to cover point
length delivery on the stumps, pushed to mid-on
short ball aimed towards the shoulders, Parnell keeps it down on the leg side and collides into Irfan while completing the single
back of length on middle, tucked to square leg
another short one and a leading edge goes high up in the air behind the stumps on the leg side but Akmal can't get there, it was out of his reach
short of length on the stumps, defends it back to the bowler
fuller and outside off, batsman lets it go
on length outside off, defended on the leg side with soft hands for a quick single and it's time for drinks
short of length outside off, crashed to sweeper cover off the back foot
back of length outside off, pushed to cover
bit of room outside off and Parnell cuts it straight to point
slower one on length outside off, Parnell doesn't pick it while trying to cut and misses
banged in short on middle, Parnell hops and defends on leg
room offered and Parnell cuts it hard in the air to the right of point and Abdur Rehman's dive can't save the boundary even though it was in his reach
back of length on the stumps, turned towards square leg off the back foot

short ball and Parnell pulls it back to the bowler. Irfan throws it back and misses the stumps and the batsman. Parnell points to the stumps, as if he's saying 'aim there'. Akmal adds to the drama by hitting the stumps from behind
a low full toss on the stumps and it's gone down the ground for four. Beautiful looking straight drive from Parnell and Irfan isn't happy with himself
the Irfan strikes back! Pitched it up outside off, Parnell drove without reaching for the ball and a thick outside edge goes into the gloves of Akmal around chest height for an easy catch
on length outside off, driven to cover
hort ball angled into the batsman, turned to deep backward square leg for one
on length aimed at the stumps, Morkel stays back to tuck it to the leg side
on length going towards the pads, turned to deep fine leg
back of length outside off, Morkel cut and it missed the off stump by a whisker
touch fuller and he defends it back to Hafeez
into the pads, gets a single towards square leg
aimed at the stumps, McLaren makes room and drives it to mid-off
back of length around off, defended off the back foot towards cover
fuller on off, driven just wide of mid-on for a single
back of length towards the stumps, tucked off the back foot on the leg side for one
short of length outside off, driven past cover and they get two by the time sweeper cover throws it back

slog goes wrong and Irfan gets another! It was angled in towards the stumps from back of length, Morkel got his front foot out of the way for a big heave and missed it as the ball struck middle. Just a matter of time that Pakistan wrap things up here
Irfan greets Tsotsobe with a bouncer and the batsman ducks to let it go
on length on middle, defends it on the leg side and Ajmal chases the ball to stop the single
back of length around off, turned to the leg side for one
straighter one is quicker and Tsotsobe pokes his bat outside off for a thick edge to go for four towards the third man area
Tsotsobe can't pick it this time. It turned a long way after pitching well outside off and hit him right in front of off stump for a big appeal and the umpire raises his finger
full on off, Tahir leans forward and blocks
slightly full on off, pushed down to mid-off
back of length around middle, defends it on off with soft hands for a quick single
big slog and he gets four! It was a slower delivery, McLaren spotted it and launched it to the deep midwicket boundary for a one-bounce four
yorker on off, blocked by McLaren
another yorker just outside off, thick edge goes down to third man
high full toss outside off, Tahir cuts it to third man and it was well above waist height to be rightly called a no ball
full on the stumps, flicked to deep midwicket for a single
round the wicket, bangs it short outside off, Tahir wants to run it down to third man but misses
short of length around off, reverse sweep from McLaren but he misses and an lbw appeal but it hit him too high on the left leg
touch fuller and turned to the leg side for one
turning in from outside off, inside edge hits the front pad
full on middle and turning enough to go down as there's a stifled appeal from Ajmal
doosra from Ajmal, pitched outside off and Tahir manages to get bat on it off the back foot
full and outside off, Tahir leans forward and defends
length ball on the stumps, batsman defends it on off
offspinner from outside leg, McLaren keeps it on the leg side for a single
flighted legspinner drifting into the batsman, Tahir leans forward and defends

big appeal for a stumping and Akmal looks confident as the square-leg umpire signals for the third umpire. It pitched outside off, Tahir came forward to defend and missed it and Akmal was quick enough to flick the balls off by the time Tahir put his right toe back into the game. OUT says the big screen and Pakistani players celebrate the equaliser
